long_description: The Old Town Vapor 10XT kayak takes the sporty features of the Vapor series 1 step further with an electronics-friendly space and a cover for the stern day well. Relatively short hull eases transport to the water, turns readily and takes up less space in your garage than long boats. Single-layer polyethylene stands up to tough aquatic environments, offers high value and cleans up in a flash. Comfort Flex XT seat flexes with every stroke and adjusts to personalize your position in the cockpit; padding in the seat and backrest ensures daylong comfort. Padded thigh braces increase comfort in the cockpit; adjustable footbraces ensure an efficient stroke and aid in tracking. Stern day well with hinged cover stores lunch, water, a rain shell, bilge pump-anything you might want to bring along for the day. E-pad storage space with bungee cord keeps electronics such as your GPS unit or MP3 player close at hand. Features a molded paddle rest, cockpit tray and beverage holder. Bow and stern carry handles make transporting the Vapor 10XT kayak to and from the water easy.
short_description: The Old Town Vapor 10XT kayak takes the sporty features of the Vapor series 1 step further with an electronics-friendly space and a cover for the stern day well.
